summary: A simple mod that makes hunting in Skyrim more interesting. Slightly increased pelt prices and long bow damage. Added Hunter merchants in every inn.
descriptionHtml:
DESCRIPTION:

I created this mod for a better hunting experience. This mod changes the weight and gold value of animal pelts and hides, slightly increased Long Bow\'s damage and added NPC merchants in all Inns in Skyrim. I created this mod for myself just to make hunting more profitable and interesting.


Weight and Value Modifications: (weight | value)

[b]Cave Bear Pelt [/b]         3 | 750
[b]Bear Pelt [/b]                3 | 500
[b]Snow Bear Pelt [/b]        3 | 600
[b]Deer Pelt [/b]                2 | 275
[b]Fox Pelt [/b]               0.5 | 75
[b]Snow Fox Pelt [/b]       0.5 | 125
[b]Sabre Cat Pelt [/b]         2 | 300
[b]Sabre Cat Snow Pelt [/b] 2 | 475
[b]Werewolf Pelt [/b]         5 | 1000
[b]Ice Wolf Pelt [/b]           1 | 150
[b]Wolf Pelt [/b]                1 | 100

Also, I created a new merchant NPC named Sylvanas Windrunner, who sells arrows, bows and some leather/hide gear and has a big amount of gold for you to sell all your goods. Sylvanas is also a hunter, so you most likely to find her in Inns and Taverns. 

Places where you can find Sylvanas Windrunner:

[b]The Frozen Hearth[/b] in Winterhold
[b]Sleeping Giant Inn[/b] in Riverwood
[b]Frostfruit Inn[/b] in Rorikstead
[b]Vilemyr Inn[/b] in Ivarstead
[b]The Bee and Barb[/b] in Riften
[b]Silver-Blood Inn[/b] at the entrance of Markarth
[b]Old Hroldan Inn[/b] east of Markarth and south-west of Rorikstead
[b]Windpeak Inn[/b] in Dawnstar
[b]Nightgate Inn[/b] in The Pale
[b]Moorside Inn[/b] in Morthal
[b]The Winking Skeever[/b] 	in Solitude
[b]Four Shields Tavern[/b] in Dragon Bridge 
[b]Dead Man\'s Drink[/b] in Falkreath
[b]Candlehearth Hall[/b] in Windhelm
[b]Braidwood Inn[/b] in Kynesgrove
[b]Warmaiden\'s[/b] in Whiterun

INSTALLATION:

It\'s a simple esp file, no  meshes no textures, so just drop it in you Data folder.

This mod might have compatibility problems with other mods that also change weight and value of listed items above.

Feel free to use and edit my mod as you like

NOTE:
In Creation Kit, Sylvana\'s merchant chest, NPC form and Faction starts with \"MerchantHunter\" so it can be easely found in Object Window
author: Nick
